content.p: Assistant Professor, Dr Kweh obtained his Bachelor Degree, Master Degree, and PhD in parallel and distributed computing from Universiti Putra Malaysia (UPM). He is now an Assistant Professor at the School of Computer Science. He has more than 15 years of teaching and research experience in the area related to computer networks. His main research interest is on distributed computing, distributed selection algorithms on various computing environment, with recent focus on data collection and analysis algorithms in data science and cloud computing.
